channel.title: 2 help questions
channel.description:
Ok, I recently downloaded MoparScape, and had 2 questions:
I always go into Mpoarscape and Start a server. Then I try to log in and play, but it says Error connecting to server. Must be down.
How should I fix this?
Also, if I log on with my RuneScape account, do the items I get on the Mopar client/server carry over to regular RuneScape?
Thanks in Advance

item.title: 2 help questions
item.dc:creator: @Auzrulz Auzrulz
item.description:
@Auzrulz wrote:

No, you do not get your items.
And your better off playing a Different Server, so go to Advertise on the main page, and then look for a server that you would and one that does have Hamachi

Read full topic

item.title: 2 help questions
item.dc:creator: @jehanne jehanne
item.description:
@jehanne wrote:

  1. error connecting to server just means you DIDNT start your own server. to play on your own server simply use the ip 127.0.0.1 or localhost. but you need your own server running.
  2. private servers are stand-alone servers, they are not connected to the real rs srvers

Read full topic
